E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1990
Subject: Progress of Todd Jones
Dear Sir,
Todd Jones is doing pretty good at A Modesto A's!
He has an ERA of 2.82, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1990
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Juan Samuel



Date: Thursday, 7/3/1990
Subject: Tom Goodwin healing process
Tom Goodwin is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 7/28/1990
Subject: Progress of Mariano Rivera
Dear Sir,
Mariano Rivera has an ERA of 2.78 at AA Huntsville Stars!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 8/4/1990
Subject: Moose Haas
Moose Haas is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor
